logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: improved documentation - added hints on wysiwyg-friendly css design. download hint page is now a page:page and provides standard lenya look and feel. updated readme to reflect testing with latest tiny release (2.1.0). minor functional changes: * display pilcrows in edit window to make paragraphs visible * changed configuration to more conservative auto-resize=false

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: updating svn log

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: updating svn log

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Refactoring credit listing and updating the current situation

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Automatic publish from forrestbot

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: set svn:eol-style native and fixed line breaks

logentry.author: josias
logentry.msg: added myself to list of committers

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Fixing linking

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add variable declarations to avoid javascript warnings in firefox. it's good practice anyway.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added check for existing query string to avoid duplicate parameters and an invalid uri. this fixes bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42229

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Eclipse project file: changed mime-type, removed 'pubconf' suffix (fixes bug 42215)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: No SCREAMING in headings, updated web tests

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: consolidated xml prettyprinting in new module. no functional changes.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: register new prettyprinting module in default configuration. HEADSUP: you will need to do this in your own pubs as well if you want to use the prettyprinting stylesheet.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: profiling module now uses prettyprinting module. i have added a "symbolic" build dependency, although i understand those are only relevant for java code. still i thought it might clear things up. if you find it confusing, revert module.xml

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: the oneform editor now uses the prettyprinting module for the "reformatting" feature. it addresses the whitespace buglet, but not http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42237.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Reverted accidential commit (one-form editor title i18n), this fixes bug 42238.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fixes a buglet that crops up in editors that support image resizing: since both height and width are accepted, that implies that the image proportions can be changed. svg needs the preserveAspectRatio="none" attribute to really allow that, otherwise the resulting image will be padded.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] fixed javadoc comment

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: fix minor xhtml validation bug, reported by richard frovarp.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: this patch removes the "reformat" button from the oneform editor temporarily. andreas has made a fix available at http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42237, but it was decided to postpone it until 1.4.1 because it touches the core API.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added some security information, cf. bug http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35786

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Automatic publish from forrestbot

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: finish renaming from ac/ac.xconf to access-controller/access-controller.xml patch by richard frovarp, thanks!

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: finish rename from config/lucene_index.xconf to config/search/lucene_index.xml, thanks to richard for spotting this! committed despite the code freeze, because this change had been agreed on and announced to the users list well before the freeze...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add missed files from r532359: activate source-code prettyprinting. mental note: there should be one single place where such stuff can be added...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: add note about cocoon problems with jdk 6

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Make clipboard method constants public. This is necessary to evaluate them when building the sitetree.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Grey out cut documents in sitetree. See bug 34988.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] removed invalid javadoc tag

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removing clipboard from session after pasting. See bug 34988.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Allow to paste documents at top level

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Don't hard-code version in build files

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed duplicate webtest.home entry from build.properties. This fixes bug 42234.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Make <code> bold only in headings

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Moved font family declaration to body element. This looks better with Kupu.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Revision control error screen: added XHTML namespace, improved layout

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Show actual version number instead of counter in revision list.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added exception handling for non-existing publications. This fixes bug 42220. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for enhancing the patch.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Show cut icons in sitetree with low opacity

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Forward revision parameter from the DocumentSourceFactory to the RepositorySourceFactory. This is a part of the fix for bug 42242.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed IE-specific filter setting for opacity.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed fake check-in when initializing the revision history of a document. I guess that was some legacy code, creating docs still works fine. This should fix bug 42242.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added FCKeditor installation instructions

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added license header, added note about keeping the website in sync

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: removed note about jdk 1.6 not working, thanks to michael ralston and markus angst for the feedback!

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Forms editor: advance before executing, otherwise the last change is not saved

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed selector which didn't match anyway because of a typo

logentry.msg: Moved 1.2-specific unit test docs to 1.2 section, added link list to 1.4 unit test docs

logentry.msg: Return empty array instead of null in UsecaseMessage.getParameters()

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Use plain error messages for unpublished ancestor docs. This makes the error messages compatible with the multiWorkflow (workflow overview) usecase. See bug 42292.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Move session selection from DocumentSourceFactory to LenyaSourceFactory. This fixes bugs 42237 and 42266.

logentry.msg: Javadoc: use @link instead of hard-coding config file paths
